string.name: 1/intro
string.value: This is a simple calculator application supporting basic arithmetic operations.

string.name: 1/calc
string.value: To do a calculation, like a regular calculator, click on a number pad and then the operation button and another number pad and then the equal sign for the result.

string.name: 1/sign
string.value: 'D' button will delete a digit of an uncalculated value and 'C' button will clear the display.

string.name: 1/limit
string.value: The maximum allowed decimal point is the 10th digit. Lower digits will be rounded off.
